p: Brown linseed ( Linum usitatissimum) samples (5 kg) were obtained from the 2014–2015 harvest. The commercial linseed samples came from a local market (Pazze Foods Company), cultivated in the Panambi municipality (28°17´33´´ latitude and 53°36´47´´ longitude), Rio Grande do Sul State, Brazil. Mechanically pressed brown linseed oil (150 mL) came from Pazze Foods Company (Panambi, RS, Brazil).
